title: Drawing, "Study after Piazza Emmanuelle in Bologna; Verso, Architectural Detail", 1811–14
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Sketchbook Page: Folio 57, 114-115. Square shown on market day. City Hall in rear, Palazzo del Podestà at right, fountain of Neptune between; inscribed at left bottom corner: 57 Piazza di Bologna. At right, two Renaissance capitals. On verso: besides bottom parts of designs -1380: columns three details of arcades.
